General.Name: Zhejiang Entive Smart Kitchen Appliance Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Entive Smart Kitchen Appliance Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of kitchen appliances and stainless-steel cabinet products in China and internationally. It also offers integrated cooking centers and sinks, integrated dishwashers, water purifiers, range hoods, gas stoves, and other kitchen appliances. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shaoxing, China.
